ISSUE.TITLE: MySQL visualisations not showing up
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi @arikfr, We're using the charts and dashboards frequently for our redshift DB and we now started adding some queries to our MySQL DB. The queries are returning correctly with data (we see it in the table tab), but when we try to create a chart from it - we're not seeing any visuals. The charts are working fine on the redshift queries. This seem to happen only on MySQL queries. Any thoughts on what causes this?
